APP_VERSION_INFO.REPORTING_MESSAGE: Yɛsrɛ, kɔ so kɔka nsɛnhia no ho

SECTIONS.CONTENT_1: Akɔɔm Map of Pi app, a yɛde Pi Community abɔ no mu. Nkɔmɔ Ho Mmara yi kyerɛ sɛnea yɛbɔ, yɛde, na yɛda wo ho nsɛm ho adwuma wɔ bere a wopɛ sɛ wokɔ so di dwuma wɔ yɛn app no.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1_1: Bere a wopɛ sɛ wopɛyɛ sɛ ɔdɔmfo, yɛbɛtɔ wo din, email address, ɔdɔmfo din, ne nsɛm foforɔ a ɛho hia.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1_2: Yɛbɛtɔ wo ho nsɛm ho fa w'adwuma, ɔdɔmfo mfonini ne dɔmfo ID ho nsɛm.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2_1: Sellers a wɔde wɔn ho gu nkɔmɔ no, wɔn ho hia sɛ wɔde Seller nsɛm bi a ɛfiri wo ho, na ɛfa Seller din, beae, na contact details.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2_2: Seller no betumi ayɛ adwuma anaa ɔbarima bi.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_1_1: Yɛde w'ahoɔden no yɛ yɛn Map of Pi dwumadi mu ho adwuma, ne nkɔmɔ Seller adwumadi no.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_2_1: Yɛbɛfa w'ahoɔden no to so, deɛ ɛbɛtɔ nkɔmɔ wɔ app Map of Pi so.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_3_1: Yɛkɔ so de fa na ɛtɔ ne so nkɔfa na yɛda Map of Pi mu ne ne dwumadi so.
SECTIONS.HEADER_4: Nea Yɛde W'ahoɔden No Sɔ Wɔmu
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_1_1: User nsɛm no betumi abɔ Seller mu na ɛbɛyɛ nkɔmɔ a ɛde asɛm kɔ nkɔmɔ.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_2_1: Yɛde nkɔmɔ abɔ nkabom ho kɔ Service provider ho a wɔbɛhyɛ Map of Pi dwumadi so.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_5_1: Yɛde a ɛwɔ dwuma wɔ nkabom daakye mu da wo ho nsɛm no.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_6_1: Wobɛtumi asesa wo account nsɛm wɔ app no mu. Wobɛtumi asesa wo Map of Pi account no sɛ wokɔ Pi Network account no mu na wopɛ sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopow wo Map of Pi data no bere a wopɛ sɛ wokɔ Map of Pi so. Wubetumi asesa ho ne nkɔmɔ afiri ɛfiri.
SECTIONS.HEADER_7: Nkɔmɔ Ho Mmara A ɛho yɛ Krado
SECTIONS.CONTENT_7_1: Yɛbɛtɔ nkɔmɔ ho mmara a ɛho yɛ krado sɛnea ɛho hia. Nea ɛda ho no ne nkɔmɔ so nsɛnhia no.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_8_1: Sɛ wowɔ nsɛnhia anaa asɛm bi a, kɔfa email kɔbɔ yɛn ho.

SECTIONS.CONTENT_1_1: Akwaaba kɔ Map of Pi app no mu, a ɛyɛ Map of Pi team no na ɛwɔ Pi Community no mu. Wokɔ so de app no yɛ adwuma a, wopene so sɛ wubedi nkɔmɔ ho mmara yi, ne yɛn Privacy Policy.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1: Wopene so sɛ wode Map of Pi app no bɛyɛ adwuma a ɛwɔ mmara ne nkɔmɔ a ɛsɔ mu.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2: Wubetumi ɛnkɔfa app no yɛ nneɛma a ɛnni ho mmara, anaa a ɛkɔda so sɛ wobɛtɔ app no mu na ɛbɛyɛ ho sɛ yɛmfa.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_3: Wobɛtumi de Map of Pi yɛ dɛn, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ pioneeɛ yɛ Pi Network nkɔmɔ da ho.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_1: Map of Pi app no ne ne nnɔnhwere ne fɔw ne nsusuw a ɛda ho yɛ Map of Pi, na ɛde ahwehwɛ a ɛda ho sɛ nea ɛda ho sɛ adwene, nsɛm ne ahyɛn faɛ.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_1: Map of Pi renkɔda nkɔmɔ ɔneɛ nkɔmɔ biara da ho na ɛfiri Map of Pi app no mu da ho.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_5_1: Wopene so sɛ wubedi abɔnten ɛkɔda Map of Pi ne ne nkɔmɔ ne mpɔtam so ɔde ɛɛ nsɛnhia.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_6_1: Nkɔmɔ ho ɛda ho nkɔmɔ a ɛda ho kɔda ɛwɔ fa sɛ ɛka de Pi Network nkɔmɔ di.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_7_1: Yɛbɛda ho adwene sɛ yɛbɛsesa anaa yɛbɛyɛ adwuma wɔ Nkɔmɔ Ho Mmara yi mu bere biara a ɛnni nkɔmɔ a ɛdi kan. Ɛda ho version

SHARED.CONFIRM_DELETE: Wopɛ sɛ wopopa saa item yi? Saa nsɛm no rentumi mfa.
SHARED.CONFIRM_DIALOG: Woadi nkɔmɔ a wode si ho. Wopɛ sɛ wopɛ nkɔ faako no?
